common.command

Class AbstractCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.command.AbstractCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddItemCommand, RemoveItemCommand, TransferItemCommand

    public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract base for useful commands such as AddItemCommand, RemoveItemCommand, and TransferItemCommand These commands are designed to be undoable.
    Author:
    murphyra

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Result execute()
        Calling this method executes the actions that this command describes.
        Returns:
        A Result object indicating the success of the action. Calling this method twice in a row will return a false result. undo() must be called before execute() can again be called.

      • executeGuts

        protected abstract Result executeGuts()

      • undo

        public Result undo()
        Calling this method undoes the actions done by execute().
        Returns:
        A Result object indicating the success of the undo. Calling this undo() before execute() is called will return a false result. Calling this method twice in a row will return a false result. execute() must be called before undo() can again be called.

      • undoGuts

        protected abstract Result undoGuts()

      • canUndo

        public boolean canUndo()
        Returns true if this command can be undone.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • canExecute

        public boolean canExecute()
        Returns true if this command can be executed.
        Returns:
        boolean telling whether the command can be executed.
